sentences.en: "Honesty is the best policy"is his credo for dealing.
sentences.cn: “诚实乃上策”是他做生意的信条。

sentences.en: American Express is emphasizing its ‘the customer is first’ credo.
sentences.cn: 美国运通公司强调其“客户至上”的信条。

sentences.en: And this is our answer -- our credo.
sentences.cn: 这就是我们的回答 —— 我们的信条.

sentences.en: Carefully in this role, free and easy to live life credo.
sentences.cn: 这个角色以认真仔细, 洒脱地生活为人生信条.

sentences.en: Community College credo: fix anything with duct tape, eat only ramen noodles, drink only caffeine.
sentences.cn: 社区学院信条: 把所有东西用输送带固定起来, 只吃拉拉面, 只喝咖啡因.

sentences.en: Continuous upgrading and improvement is our credo.
sentences.cn: 不断改进、提高质量是我们的信念.

sentences.en: Credo : I must return to headquarters and report.
sentences.cn: 我必须回到总部去报告.

sentences.en: Credo : My men are currently in pursuit Dante.
sentences.cn: 我的手下已经在追击但丁了.

sentences.en: Credo : We must evacuate the residents back to Headquarters.
sentences.cn: 我们必须要疏散这些居民到总部.

sentences.en: Credo: I served the dream of a world you spoke of.
sentences.cn: 我曾为了你口中的理想世界,你宣扬的救世主而遵从于你.

sentences.en: Credo: I will return with help! You stall him until then!
sentences.cn: 我会回来协助的! 你先在这里拖住他.

sentences.en: Credo: Our priority is to capture Dante.
sentences.cn: 我们的首要方针是要抓住但丁.

sentences.en: Credo: That's what the witnesses said.
Credo: You just so lightly in a time of crisis? You must capture him.
sentences.cn: 面对危机的时候你就这么轻浮? 你必须抓住他.

sentences.en: It's a vehicle that delivers the well - known SRT credo of benchmark performance.
sentences.cn: 它是一种工具,提供了著名的基准性能污泥龄信条.

sentences.en: The Greek poet Pindar expressed it in the credo: " Become what you are. "
sentences.cn: 希腊诗人品达罗斯用这一信条加以表达: “ 成为你自己. ”

trans.tran_en: a formal statement of the beliefs of a particular person, group, religion etc
